name: Copper CRM
description: Integrate with Copper CRM to list, create, search and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List People
tools.description: List people (contacts) from Copper CRM. Copper uses POST for list/search endpoints.

tools.name: Create Person
tools.description: Create a new person (contact) in Copper CRM. Provide at least a name.

tools.name: Search Leads
tools.description: Search leads in Copper CRM. Copper uses POST for search endpoints.

tools.name: List Opportunities
tools.description: List opportunities from Copper CRM. Copper uses POST for list/search endpoints.

tools.name: Create Task
tools.description: Create a new task in Copper CRM. Tasks can be associated with people, leads, or opportunities.

userEmail.label: User Email
userEmail.description: Your Copper account email (required for X-PW-UserEmail header)
